## Bee.getChequebookAddress() method

Get the address of the chequebook contract used.

\*\*Warning:\*\* The address is returned with 0x prefix unlike all other calls. https://github.com/ethersphere/bee/issues/1443

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChequebookAddress(options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<ChequebookAddressResponse>;
```
